backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling access-controlled contact submissions, appointment requests, domain draft storage, and decommission mode using persistent Map states.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise descriptions of various frontend components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode values, and global styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML document setting metadata, icons, and mounting point for the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and specifying sitemap location.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap XML defining crawl URLs, change frequencies, and priorities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration wiring all app routes inside the SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/forms/Appointmen: Appointment request form with validation, submission via custom hook, and success/error handling.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: General contact form supporting validation, submission, and success/error alerts.
Page hero section with optional subtitle, badge, variant backgrounds, and pattern cache-busting.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageHeroI: Hero image component with cache-busting, error fallback for generated assets, and configurable positioning.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Layout section wrapper providing background variants and standard spacing.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer with logo, contact info, hours, and build/version details including cache-busted assets.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, emergency contact bar, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Overall page layout wrapper including header, footer, SEO manager, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/seo/Organization: Outputs JSON-LD structured data describing the medical organization for SEO.
frontend/src/components/seo/SeoManager.t: Updates document head tags based on the current route, including title, meta, Open Graph, Twitter, and canonical tags.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines the hospital name and a helper to compose page titles with branding.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Generates a build ID for cache-busting and formats a user-friendly build version.
frontend/src/config/contactDetails.ts: Centralizes hospital contact info and provides helpers for emergency and phone tel links.
frontend/src/config/seo.ts: Defines site-wide SEO metadata, per-route SEO settings, and helpers to build titles, descriptions, and canonical URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDomainDraft.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save a domain draft through the backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, managing identities, login flow, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAppointmentR: Submits appointment requests via the backend actor and normalizes errors for user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Handles contact form submissions through the backend actor with basic error normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes with a medical color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with hero section, mission and vision cards, facility images, and core values grid.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentRequestPag: Displays appointment booking steps, consultation room image, and an appointment request form.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact details, reception image, and a contact form within structured sections.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Shows a decommissioned service notice with related illustrations and an informational card.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx: Lists doctor suites with details and displays hero and team images.
frontend/src/pages/DomainDraftPage.tsx: Manages domain draft creation and editing with authentication checks and draft loading/saving UI.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyPage.tsx: Renders the emergency services page with hero sections, emergency contact alert, service list, and images.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with hero content, navigation actions, Google search link, and cache-busted hero images.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 not‑found page with hero artwork, guidance imagery, and a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a comprehensive list of medical services with icons, hero imagery, and navigation support.
frontend/src/utils/generatedAssets.ts: Provides helpers to detect generated assets and append cache‑busting version parameters to their URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query, hash, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, spacing, typography, shadows, and container settings for the project.
project_state.json: Defines the website project’s state, required new images, and existing features focused on adding photos across all pages. Includes architectural notes, pending requests, and metadata for build planning.
